channel.title: CVE Feed for MZ Automation -- libiec61850
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MZ Automation -- libiec61850

item.title: CVE-2022-2971|2024-09-17T00:16:48.262Z -- mz%20automation -- libiec61850
item.description: MZ Automation's libIEC61850 (versions 1.4 and prior; version 1.5 prior to commit a3b04b7bc4872a5a39e5de3fdc5fbde52c09e10e) accesses a resource using an incompatible type, which could allow an attacker to crash the server with a malicious payload.

item.title: CVE-2022-2973|2024-09-17T00:31:43.550Z -- mz%20automation -- libiec61850
item.description: MZ Automation's libIEC61850 (versions 1.4 and prior; version 1.5 prior to commit a3b04b7bc4872a5a39e5de3fdc5fbde52c09e10e) uses a NULL pointer in certain situations. which could allow an attacker to crash the server.
